inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of acromegaly, and treated at the department of Endocrinology, Copenhagen University Hospital, Rigshospitalet, Denmark (tertiary referral hospital)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with medications potentially influencing glucose metabolism, including thiazides and steroids (replacement therapy with hydrocortisone not included but matched for)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic or earlier events of acute pancreatitis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Bowel resection or larger gastrointestinal surgical interventions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old man with known Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago, lab studies show IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
